pattern.name: Waves
pattern.description:
Simple steady waves.
Includes a slider to adjust the wave speed.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: Adjust the speed of each wave

pattern.name: Toggle
pattern.description:
On and off every second.
Includes a slider to adjust the toggle speed.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: Speed of toggling on and off

pattern.name: Slow Increase + Hold at Max
pattern.description:
Slow increase to max intensity and then hold for a given number of seconds.
Includes controls for how quickly to ramp up and how long to hold at max intensity.

pattern.name: Random Torment
pattern.description:
Ramp to 100% after a random amount of time for a random amount of time.
Includes controls for adjusting the time until the next ramp up, the ramp up speed, and how long to hold at max speed.

hold-time.name: Hold Time
hold-time.description: How many seconds to stay at max intensity (random value from | separated list)

ramp-time.name: Ramp Time
ramp-time.description: How fast to ramp up to max intensity (percent increase per 0.1 seconds)

random-start.name: Random Start
random-start.description: How many seconds to wait until starting the next ramp up (random value from | separated list)

pattern.name: Increase Then Reverse
pattern.description: Ramp up for 2 seconds and then ramp down for 2 seconds.

pattern.name: Increase Then Drop
pattern.description: Ramp up for 2 seconds and then drop to 0.
